ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 14 Jul 1998, Andy Simpson wrote:

> All necros I've ever grouped with want me to play hymn of restoration and
> they claim it greatly helps their mana regen. All other mana users see no
> increase in mana regen no matter what song I play. Maybe this is a bug that
> just affects Necros?
>

THis due to a spell that necros have that basically allows them to convert
2hp to 1 mana point. So the extra hp provides then with a significant
increase in mana. There is spell for Shamans that also do the samething.
Eventually at the higher levels when your casters get a manastone, they
will ask you to twist hymm and clarity to significantly increase their
mana recovery.

Treilanin Loreweaver 21st Chorus Bard of Kelethin
Aariel 5th Circle Mage of Felwithe
